thread.title: Marisol Ferrante

author: Marisol Ferrante
title: Marisol Ferrante
text: I was looking an online store to order candy in bulk and found CandyWarehouse. The cost was considerably better online than in a physical store. I have ordered several times from CandyWarehouse because I always get my merchandise at a reasonable time. The candy is fresh and I get a great deal buying in bulk. I'm glad I found this wonderful site.
